TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1090
TEI.2.document_title: William S Parrott to Stephen F Austin, 09-18-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: William S. Parrott to Austin, Mexico, September 18, 1834. Statement of account.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1090

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*William S. Parrott to Austin, Mexico, September 18, 1834. Statement of account.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*. *date_mentioned n="09-18-1834">Sept. 18th 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*My Dr Sir*/p*
*p*Enclosed you have a statement of your a/c leaving a bal in your favour of $416.94 *person_mentioned*Capt offutt*/person_mentioned* was advised that we were instructed to pay your bill at the *location_mentioned*Hotel */location_mentioned*which he said was well but has never Sent it in*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Dr Grant*/person_mentioned* advised me that he had sent money to *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*to meet my Dft in your favour and that I might consider it as paid nothing more has been said on the subject and if you return me the Dft I will pay over to *person_mentioned*Parrott and O*/person_mentioned* the Amt to your credit, tho the course would derange all my accounts with the Dr, as he has long Since been credited with it*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*W. S. Parrott */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Inclosure]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Esqr.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Parrott and Co.*/person_mentioned* Dr*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1831">1831 [1834?]*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-31-1831">March 31*/date_mentioned* To Cash paid for Sundry things per mem°______________ $ 22. 93*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-22-1831">April 22*/date_mentioned* To do " for pickles for his acct____________________ 1.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-15-1831">May 15*/date_mentioned* To do " for one Bottle anizette___________________ 1.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-26-1831">" 26*/date_mentioned* To do " for one D° Brandy_____________________ 1.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-11-1831">June 11*/date_mentioned* To do " D° D° ____________________ 1.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-14-1831">" 14*/date_mentioned* To do Advanced *person_mentioned*Padre Muldoon*/person_mentioned* by *person_mentioned*Wm S Parrott*/person_mentioned* for he was responsible—transferred to our Books___________ 200. 00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-13-1831">" 13*/date_mentioned* To Cash—paid his Order in favr of_____________________ 50. 00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-14-1831">" 14 */date_mentioned* To D° " for one Bottle Brandy 1 50/100 pen knife $2__________________________ 3. 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-20-1831">" 20*/date_mentioned* To Do " his Order in fav of______________________ 6.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-21-1831">" 21*/date_mentioned* To D° " for one Bottle Brandy___________________ 1.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-25-1831">25 */date_mentioned* To Do " for Do D° ____________________ 1.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-25-1831">" " */date_mentioned* To B° Lent him per Orders__________________________ 10.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-08-1831">July 8 */date_mentioned* To D° paid his Order in favr of *person_mentioned*Mr Whiting*/person_mentioned*__________ 100.84*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-13-1831">" 13*/date_mentioned* To Do " his Do fav, of_______________ 5.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-19-1831">" 19*/date_mentioned* To Do " his D° to *person_mentioned*Bearer*/person_mentioned*_______________________ 4.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-30-1831">" 30 */date_mentioned* To D° paid Sundry things postage Brandy etc since 19th 7.*/p*
*p*417. 77*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-03-1831">Sep 3 */date_mentioned* To D° Franking letters to *location_mentioned*Tampico*/location_mentioned*____________________ 1. 50*/p*
*p*12 To D° 2 Dozen *location_mentioned*Havanna */location_mentioned*Segars_______________________ 1.00*/p*
*p*$420. 27*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1834">1834 */date_mentioned* Cr */p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-03-1834">June 3rd*/date_mentioned* By his Bill on *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* at 30 days sight______$747. 51*/p*
*p*Prem: on the same at 12 per Cent_______________ 89. 70*/p*
*p*837. 21*/p*
*p*Balance in favor of *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin_*/person_mentioned*_____Dollars___________ 416. 21*/p*
*/div1*
